name: False Promises
flavor_text: Gripped in the hands of the desperate many.

frame.name: High-Impact Frame
frame.description: Slow-firing and high-damage. This weapon is more accurate when stationary and aiming down sights.

perks.description:
Lightly vented barrel.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Arrowhead Brake

perks.description:
Stable barrel attachment.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Chambered Compensator

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Fluted Barrel

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Full Bore

perks.description:
Durable ranged barrel.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Hammer-Forged Rifling

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Polygonal Rifling

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.
perks.name: Alloy Magazine

perks.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Appended Mag

perks.description:
Rounds cause extra damage to combatants' shields and overpenetrate targets. 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds

perks.description:
Shots from this weapon knock the target back farther.
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: High-Caliber Rounds

perks.description:
Rounds ricochet off hard surfaces. 
  •  Increases stability 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Ricochet Rounds

perks.description:
Optimized for fast reloading.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
perks.name: Flared Magwell

perks.description:
Improved reload and range.
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Light Mag

perks.description: This weapon gains a boost to reload speed as your health gets lower.
perks.name: Underdog

perks.description: Increased reload, stability, and handling when enemies are in close proximity.
perks.name: Threat Detector

perks.description: Picking up Special or Heavy ammo automatically loads this weapon beyond normal capacity.
perks.name: Overflow

perks.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for a short duration.
perks.name: Killing Wind

perks.description: Improves accuracy and stability while continuously holding down the trigger.
perks.name: Dynamic Sway Reduction

perks.description: Each rapid kill with this weapon progressively increases reload speed for a short time.
perks.name: Feeding Frenzy

perks.description: Defeating targets partially reloads the magazine from reserves.
perks.name: Subsistence

perks.description: Reloading after a final blow also reloads stowed weapons.
perks.name: Sympathetic Arsenal

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus damage when three or more enemies are in close proximity.
perks.name: Surrounded

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage from melee kills and kills with this weapon.
perks.name: Swashbuckler

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one kill.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: Causing damage with this weapon increases its stability.
perks.name: Zen Moment

perks.description: This weapon becomes more accurate and boosts handling as your health gets lower.
perks.name: Eye of the Storm

perks.description: Kills with this weapon temporarily grant increased damage. Stacks 3x.
perks.name: Rampage
